update power_project
project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_image = #{projectImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_address = #{projectAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_type = #{projectType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contract_customer = #{contractCustomer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
energy_price = #{energyPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
charging_area = #{chargingArea,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
project_area = #{projectArea,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
contract_life = #{contractLife,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trusteeship_time = #{trusteeshipTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
expire_time = #{expireTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

design_heating_load = #{designHeatingLoad,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
company_cooling_load = #{companyCoolingLoad,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

conditioner_area = #{conditionerArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

table_name = #{tableName,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
running_time = #{runningTime,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update power_project set project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_image = #{projectImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_address = #{projectAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_type = #{projectType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_customer = #{contractCustomer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, energy_price = #{energyPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, charging_area = #{chargingArea,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, project_area = #{projectArea,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, contract_life = #{contractLife,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trusteeship_time = #{trusteeshipTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expire_time = #{expireTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, design_cooling_load = #{designCoolingLoad,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, design_heating_load = #{designHeatingLoad,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, company_cooling_load = #{companyCoolingLoad,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, company_heating_load = #{companyHeatingLoad,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, host_only = #{hostOnly,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, electric_price = #{electricPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, water_price = #{waterPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, gas_price = #{gasPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_pid = #{projectPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_region = #{projectRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, conditioner_area = #{conditionerArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, project_introduce = #{projectIntroduce,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, table_name = #{tableName}, running_time = #{runningTime} where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update power_project set project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_image = #{projectImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_address = #{projectAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_type = #{projectType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_customer = #{contractCustomer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, energy_price = #{energyPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, charging_area = #{chargingArea,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, project_area = #{projectArea,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, contract_life = #{contractLife,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trusteeship_time = #{trusteeshipTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expire_time = #{expireTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, design_cooling_load = #{designCoolingLoad,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, design_heating_load = #{designHeatingLoad,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, company_cooling_load = #{companyCoolingLoad,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, company_heating_load = #{companyHeatingLoad,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, host_only = #{hostOnly,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, electric_price = #{electricPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, water_price = #{waterPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, gas_price = #{gasPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_pid = #{projectPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_region = #{projectRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, conditioner_area = #{conditionerArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, table_name = #{tablName,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, running_time = #{runningTime} where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select project_name from power_project where project_name = #{project_name}

select p.project_id, p.project_name, p.project_image, p.project_address, pt.type_name as conditioner_area, p.project_type, p.contract_customer, p.energy_price, p.charging_area, p.project_area, p.contract_life, p.trusteeship_time, p.expire_time, p.design_cooling_load, p.design_heating_load, p.company_cooling_load, p.company_heating_load, p.host_only, electric_price, p.water_price, p.gas_price, p.type, p.project_pid, p.project_region, p.conditioner_area, p.create_time, p.update_time, p.project_introduce, p.table_name, p.running_time from power_project p join power_project_type pt on p.project_type = pt.type_id where p.project_id = #{projectId}
select p.project_id, p.project_name, p.project_pid, p.table_name from power_project p where p.project_pid = #{projectPid}
select project_id, project_name, project_pid, table_name from power_project
select p.project_id, p.project_name, p.type, p.table_name from power_project p where p.type = '1' order by p.create_time desc

select p.project_id, p.project_name, p.project_image, p.project_address, pt.type_name as conditioner_area, p.project_type, p.contract_customer, p.energy_price, p.charging_area, p.project_area, p.contract_life, p.trusteeship_time, p.expire_time, p.design_cooling_load, p.design_heating_load, p.company_cooling_load, p.company_heating_load, p.host_only, p.electric_price, p.water_price, p.gas_price, p.type, p.project_pid, p.project_region,
p.create_time, p.update_time, p.project_introduce, p.table_name, p.running_time from power_project p join power_project_type pt on p.project_type = pt.type_id
p.project_pid = #{projectPid}
and p.project_type =#{projectType}
and p.project_name =#{projectName}
and p.type = '2'
order by p.project_area desc
order by p.trusteeship_time desc
order by p.expire_time desc
order by p.contract_life desc
order by p.energy_price desc
order by p.charging_area desc
order by p.create_time desc
select project_id, project_name, table_name from power_project where type = '2' order by create_time desc
select project_id, project_name, table_name from power_project where type = '2' and project_pid = #{projectId}
